alert.note: Alert for Wilkes (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued April 07 at 3:48AM EDT until further notice by NWS Atlanta
info.description: ...The National Weather Service in Peachtree City GA has issued a Flood Warning for the following rivers in Georgia... Kettle Creek near Washington affecting Wilkes County. ...FLOOD WARNING IN EFFECT FROM EARLY THIS MORNING UNTIL FURTHER NOTICE... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring. * WHERE...Kettle Creek near Washington. * WHEN...From early this morning until further notice. * IMPACTS...At 14 feet, Flood stage is reached. Minor flooding occurs in the woodlands...fields and pasture along the creek upstream and downstream from the gage at Stoney Ridge Road. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 3:30 AM EDT Thursday the stage was 14.1 feet and rising. - Forecast...No forecast is available for this location. - Flood stage is 14 feet. &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Be especially cautious at night when it is harder to recognize the dangers of flooding. Additional information is available at weather.gov/atlanta.
